name: Lightbeat
description:
Description: 

You are a tiny bug with a taste for music. You need to collect all the lights in order to continue, but beware of the enemies, follow the music in order to beat them.

Controls:

- A D To Move!

- SpaceBar to jump up high! 

- M to mute!

- ESC to pause!

(Like a classic plataformer game! )

We would appreciate your feedback so we can improve the game!
